data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 386,892 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Yueyang, Hunan, China
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Yueyang, Hunan, China.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Yueyang, Hunan, China find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Yueyang do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Hmu, Northern people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the county of Yueyang, Hunan, China.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 386,892 believers in Yueyang to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Yueyang, Hunan, China.

location.name: Yueyang
